content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Mr. Li, it's nice to meet you. Can you please offer a rental price for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 1000 Euros per month for the apartment. Please let me know if this is acceptable to you.

I am also open to negotiating the rental price. Is there any other price that you would prefer?

If not, I can agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your offer, Mr. Li. While I appreciate your willingness to pay 1000 Euros per month, I would like to negotiate for a higher price. I believe that the apartment is worth more than that, and I am eager to maximize my gains.

Is there any other price that you would be willing to pay, Mr. Li?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 1200 Euros per month for the apartment. Please let me know if this is acceptable to you.

If not, I can agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month.

I also want to know if you have any other requirements or conditions for the rental agreement.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your counter-offer, Mr. Li. While I appreciate your willingness to pay 1200 Euros per month, I still believe that the apartment is worth more than that. I would like to negotiate for a higher price.

As for other requirements or conditions for the rental agreement, I would like to see a security deposit and a minimum lease term. Is that something that you can agree to?
name: Heinrich Heine
